Detailed Description

IClientSocketListener handles Socket callback.

Handles complete event in asynchronous client socket. In synchronous mode, IClientSocketListner isn't called. When a method of IClientSocketListen is called, it is in IO thread. Methods of IClientSocketListen may not be blocked, or the IO thread will be blocked. 

 class Listener : public IClientSocketListener {
   // ...
 };
 ClientSocket socket;
 Listener ltn;
 socket.addListener(&ltn);

virtual void gaia::net::IClientSocketListener::onClosed ( ClientSocket *  socket,
SocketCloseReason  reason 
) [pure virtual]

Connection has been closed.

This method is called only when the socket is waiting for reading. If the socket is not waiting for input, socket will closed sliently.

Parameters:
socketthe socket that issues this event.
reasonthat cause connection be closed.
